title: hStdOutput and hStdError parameters
extract: A file with associated buffering is called a stream and is declared to be a pointer to a defined type FILE. ... The following symbolic values in <unistd.h> define the file descriptors that is associated with the C-language stdin stdout and stderr when the application is started: STDIN_FILENO. Standard input value stdin.
extract_html: A file with associated buffering is called a stream and is declared to be a pointer to a defined type FILE. ... The following symbolic values in <unistd.h> define the file descriptors that is associated with the C-language stdin stdout and stderr when the application is started: STDIN_FILENO. Standard input value stdin.
